Shield Wall.name: Shield Wall
Shield Wall.flavor: Readying your shield, you prepare to defend yourself and nearby allies from incoming fire.
Shield Wall.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Wall.effect: Until the stance ends, you and allies adjacent to you gain cover against ranged and area attacks.

Sudden Shield Bash.name: Sudden Shield Bash
Sudden Shield Bash.flavor: Your foe chooses to ignore you, receiving a solid blow from your shield as thanks.
Sudden Shield Bash.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you shifts or makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target
Sudden Shield Bash.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Sudden Shield Bash.attack:
Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Increase to Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude at 21st level.
Sudden Shield Bash.onHit: The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Reverberating Shield.name: Reverberating Shield
Reverberating Shield.flavor: You turn and shove your shield into your foe’s attack, causing a numbing vibration.
Reverberating Shield.trigger: An adjacent enemy misses you or an ally with a melee attack
Reverberating Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Reverberating Shield.effect: The target is dazed and weakened (save ends both).
